Articles: The robot reached the thick of the forest, where there was a signal for help, it only had to find its source somewhere nearby
Walking a bit through the forest, he found the source of the signal - it turned out to be another robot that cannot move due to the fact that it has blown a chip that regulates the lower limbs
The robot learned from the victim that the spare chip is in one of three places
The robot decided to write down these coordinates to help a robot in need
The robot decides to go through these places one by one and starts its journey
Robot's hut becomes the first location, it might contain something
He searches it and finds nothing in it, but there are two more places left
He wants to cross this cabin out of the places he's been to
Robot crossed out a hut from the places it's been, two more left
After walking along the road, he finds a small tree that the wounded robot marked, he examines it and does not find anything of value
The robot accidentally spotted the conor and is about to reach it
Now he needs to record her for inspection too, to build a march to her
The robot reached the conor and started analyzing it
Suddenly, he caught sight of a suitcase with microcircuits
Now he needs to select the right chip for the wounded robot
The robot selected a reddish chip and moved towards the weakened robot
He gave him the chip and the wounded robot asked for help again
This time our hero needs to transfer the old settings to the new chip
The robot successfully connected the desired settings to the robot's chip
The robot asked his new friend for help, he said that he wants to find treasures, but he doesn't know exactly how to get to the right place

The robot said that the ruins of the old castle are located behind a large ridge and it is unlikely that the robot will be able to climb over it. But at the same time, to get around it, most likely there will not be enough battery power. But there is a dilapidated mine, which once then this robot worked, he agrees to take it to him. The robot reports that, of course, he found the microcircuit, but due to the fact that he spends energy and does not restore it, his battery charge is less than one day.

A new acquaintance accompanies him to his hut and inside the hut offers to charge the battery. The robot starts spinning a device similar to bicycle wheels and charges the cell for the robot that he wants to insert, but at the same time he asks that the battery work without failure to indicate the old charge and model of the robot.
The robot filled in the information and in a couple of minutes it was already with a new battery, its charge will last for a long time and you don't have to worry about it
They walked with the robot further down the path and then a new acquaintance stopped him
He said that the mine could be fatal for a creature that had never been in it, and decided to tell him the way, how to navigate the mine correctly
The robot said it remembered what the other robot told it and thanked it for the data.
The other robot repeated that he would not go any further with him, as he needed to look after the cat that was sitting in his hut.

He also said that he has an idea how to get the robot to the mine and that he remembers the route, despite the fact that there is no path to the mines as such, but at the same time he can rename the place that he already called and they do not need to be taken into account in the campaign to the mine
The robot found several repetitions in the words of another robot and realized that it was just a little bit to go to the mine
He immediately headed towards her, the path through the dungeons will begin soon
